Title: Lionel Messi
Sentence: On 26 August
column4: Barcelona's sporting director Ramon Planes iterated club's desire to "build a team around most important player in world" > news url Messi  Barcelona want to 'build team around most important player in world' publisher BBC Sport access date 26 August 2020 > and affirmed Messi will only be able to leave should a buyer pay his €700 million buyout clause; a reported early termination option available in Messi's contract (which would have allowed him to leave club for free) could only be exercised if he had communicated his decision to Barcelona by 31 May 2020
column5: although player's representatives argued deadline should be set to 31 August
column6: due to Impact of COVID 19 pandemic on association football adjourned 2019–20 season.

column4: Barcelona's sporting director Ramon Planes iterated club's desire to "build a team around most important player in world" > news url Messi  Barcelona want to 'build team around most important player in world' publisher BBC Sport access date 26 August 2020 > and affirmed Messi will only be able to leave should a buyer pay his €700 million buyout clause; a reported early termination option available in Messi's contract (which would have allowed him to leave club for free) could only be exercised if he had communicated his decision to Barcelona by 31 May 2020
column5: although player's representatives argued deadline should be set to 31 August
column6: due to Impact of COVID 19 pandemic on association football adjourned 2019–20 season.
